title.rendered: “Decoding IDF’s Intense Counter-Terrorism Operations in Gaza Strip: Hidden Bombs, Weapons Depots, and More”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue to fight in the Gaza Strip; our forces have eliminated several terrorist cells and found many weapons, including a bomb that was hidden in a clinic in the Shuja’iyya neighborhood.

The 55th Infantry Brigade’s combat team conducted combined raids on terrorist infrastructures in Khan Yunis during which the soldiers targeted a terrorist who fired an RPG at the force. The soldiers found a weapons depot with explosives, guns, and grenades.

Fighters from the engineering corps and other forces found a bomb hidden in a clinic near a school in the heart of the Shuja’iyya neighborhood. Similarly, fighters from the combat team of the 179th Brigade (“Ram”) operating in the Shuja’iyya neighborhood found many weapons including Kalashnikovs, vests, and ammunition depots.

The combat team of the 179th Brigade (“Ram”) destroyed a tunnel shaft near the seashore in the southern part of Gaza city. After the explosion, the forces identified a large number of terrorists who fled into a building on the coastline. A combat aircraft of the Air Force destroyed the building.

Israeli naval forces continued attacking terrorist targets in the Gaza Strip, including buildings where Hamas terrorists were identified and vessels used by the organization for terrorist purposes. Furthermore, the Israeli naval forces continue to assist the IDF forces operating in the Strip.

Attached is a review of the soldiers who found the bomb in the clinic in Shuja’iyya: https://bit.ly/4alJZNk

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks: https://bit.ly/3Txp2sS

Attached is documentation of IDF forces operations in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/48p2oqM

Attached are photos from the operations of IDF forces in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/1912202321114854

Attached are photos of the combat means found in Khan Yunis and Shuja’iyya: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC191220236521
